H0.text: Tissues form systems based on the organization of living things.

H1.text: Tissues are made of cells based on the organization of living things.

H2.text: Based on the organization of living things, tissues are made of organs.

H3.text: Tissues do the work of cells based on the organization of living things.

A4.text: Tissues occupy a biological organizational level between cells and a complete organ. Accordingly, organs are formed by the functional grouping together of multiple tissues.

A5.text: Organs are formed by the functional grouping together of multiple tissues.
